options.optionText: Well, that just happened. How you feeling, Buster?
options.responseText: YOU... YOU ACTUALLY... BRO, WHAT THE ACTUAL FUCK?! RIGHT IN FRONT OF ME?! *IN FRONT OF ME?!*

followUpOptions.optionText: Yeah, I guess you weren’t much of a protector after all.
followUpOptions.responseText: YOU THINK THIS IS A JOKE?! I AM THE WALL THAT KEEPS THE FILTH OUT! AND YOU... YOU... YOU'RE A DEAD MAN! I’M GONNA SNAP YOU IN HALF!

followUpOptions.optionText: Relax, Buster. You said you were *zen*, right?
followUpOptions.advanceDayWithStatusMessage: You wake up in your vault room, head pounding like you got hit by a radscorpion. Buster's backhand knocked you out cold.
